text: @NYGovCuomo Ultraviolet germicidal bulbs can kill the Coronavirus. You can buy them cheap, kill & use the light 24/7 to kill bacteria/viruses in every American's home. UV, or Black light, are common devices. (read Mechinations of Divinity)
